ppl age Manual Page

Name

ppl age - List or show contacts’ ages

Synopsis

ppl age [<contact>]

Description

This command calculates contacts’ current ages in years based on their date of birth. The purpose of this command is to provide easy access to an often-needed piece of information which is indirectly available from the data in the address book.

Invoked without any arguments, all contacts are listed with their respective ages. If a <contact> is specified, only the age of that contact will be shown.

Examples

$ ppl bday jdoe 1980-01-01
$ ppl age jdoe
33
$ ppl age
fred: 25
jdoe: 33

See Also
